MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:12am to safely carry repair work on the underground cable fault on Barassie Drive and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:06am on 16th January 2021
